Fill the tiling chip with 200 μl pre-warmed stripping buffer.
3. Place the chip in hybridization oven at 65°C. Rotate 20 min at 60 rpm.

Strip again with another 200 μl of stripping buffer for 10 min.
  5.
Repeat step 4 for one more time.
Place the chip in the hybridization oven at 65°C. Rotate 5 min at 60 rpm.

Wash buffer and repeat step 6 twice.
  8.
If no signal is detected on the image,
Proceed to hybridize with the target \(re-probe).
Place the storage buffer with pre-hybridization buffer.
Place the chip in the hybridization oven at 45°C. Rotate 5 min at 60 rpm.
If not re-probed immediately, the chip can be stored at 4°C overnight.
